game.name: BioShock Infinite - Season Pass
game.shortDescription: Get three DLC packs at an incredible discount only available to Season Pass holders. BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode OneCome back to Rapture in a story that brings Booker and Elizabeth to the underwater city on the eve of its fall from grace.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get three DLC packs at an incredible discount only available to Season Pass holders. BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode OneCome back to Rapture in a story that brings Booker and Elizabeth to the underwater city on the eve of its fall from grace.
